portfolio.title: Featured Projects
portfolio.subtitle: A selection of my most recent and relevant work

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Platform (B2B/B2C)
ecommerce.description: E-commerce platform for the online sale of plastic and acrylic products and materials, and graphic printing equipment, managing an extensive inventory catalog, quotes, orders, and logistics for a national branch network.

aiImage.title: SaaS Nutrition and Fitness Platform (Software as a Service)
aiImage.description: Comprehensive coaching system that combines a mobile app (iOS/Android) with personalized human monitoring via WhatsApp, for managing macro-based diets, exercise routines, and measuring body progress.

taskManager.title: Legal Workflow Management System
taskManager.description: Platform for designing, implementing, and managing complex business process automations without code, with advanced task assignment, status tracking, API integrations, and reporting capabilities to optimize productivity.

analytics.title: Artificial Intelligence Platform for Customer Experience (CX)
analytics.description: Technological solution that uses AI and automation to optimize customer service through intelligent virtual agents, real-time interaction analysis, and omnichannel tools, improving efficiency and reducing operating costs.

social.title: SVOD (Subscription Video on Demand) Streaming Platform
social.description: Subscription video on demand service that offers a curated catalog of Spanish-language movies, series, and documentaries, with 100% family-friendly content free of language and inappropriate scenes, available on multiple devices and in HD/4K resolutions.

fitness.title: Fitness Tracking App
fitness.description: Mobile app for exercise and nutrition tracking with AI integration.
